group.name: Plugin Commands: End Device Support
group.description: The End Device Support plugin contributes commands for controlling the polling behavior of the device.

command.description: Display the status of the End Device's polling.
Sets whether the device's poll completed callback function is enabled.

arg.name: pollCompletedCallbackCommand
arg.description: The value indicating whether the device's poll completed callback function is enabled.

command.description: Sets whether the CLI forces the device to short poll.

arg.name: shortPoll
arg.description: The value indicating whether the device should short poll.
